sentence_zh_TW: 我們必須找出這個複雜的問題的根源，以便提出有效的解決方案。
sentence: We must identify the root cause of this complex ______ to propose effective solutions.

sentence_zh_TW: 讓我們一起合作，創造一個積極的工作環境，加強團隊的凝聚力。

sentence_zh_TW: 這座橋橫跨了河流，使得兩岸之間的交通變得更加方便。
sentence: This bridge spans ______ the river, making transportation between the two sides much easier.

sentence_zh_TW: 他對突然出現的聚會感到驚訝，因為他完全不知道這個計劃的存在。
sentence: He was ______ by the sudden gathering because he had no idea the plan existed.

sentence_zh_TW: 從這個城市往東走，你會發現美麗的海灘和壯觀的日出。
sentence: Heading ______ from this city, you will find beautiful beaches and spectacular sunrises.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個會議的主題涵蓋了當前最重要的環境問題，對社會影響深遠。
sentence: The ______ of this conference covers the most pressing environmental issues of our time, with far-reaching societal impacts.

sentence_zh_TW: 使用這根繩子，你可以將所有物品牢牢固定，確保它們不會掉落或損壞。
sentence: Using this ______, you can securely fasten all items to ensure they do not fall or get damaged.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個比賽中，她獲得了第十一名，儘管她的表現非常出色。
sentence: In this competition, she placed ______, despite her outstanding performance.

sentence_zh_TW: 他的手上有一道傷疤，講述著他多年前勇敢戰鬥的故事。
sentence: His ______ bears a scar that tells the story of a brave battle he fought years ago.

sentence_zh_TW: 如果你要去旅行，記得把你的相機帶上，捕捉旅行中的每一個美好瞬間。
sentence: If you are going on a trip, remember to bring your ______ to capture every beautiful moment.

sentence_zh_TW: 養成良好的習慣能夠幫助你提高生活質量，實現個人的成長。
sentence: Developing a good ______ can help improve your quality of life and foster personal growth.

sentence_zh_TW: 她在收到好消息時感到高興，這讓她一天的心情都變得明朗。
sentence: She felt ______ when she received the good news, brightening her mood for the entire day.

sentence_zh_TW: 為了及时收到訂單，客戶需要在發貨之前完成付款。
sentence: To receive their orders on time, customers need to complete the ______ before shipment.

sentence_zh_TW: 查明這個故障的原因對於未來的預防和改進是至關重要的。
sentence: Identifying the ______ for this malfunction is crucial for future prevention and improvement.

sentence_zh_TW: 她的可愛笑容如同陽光般溫暖，總能讓周圍的人倍感舒心。

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個特別的折扣期間，顧客可以購買許多商品以獲得更好的交易。

sentence_zh_TW: 科學家們在實驗中發現了第十億的微小粒子，這一發現將為研究帶來深刻的影響。

sentence_zh_TW: 每一個珍貴的時刻都應被好好珍惜，不論是在家庭聚會還是旅行中。
